cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one:
• This creature deals 3 damage to any target. Draw two cards, then discard a card.
• Create a 1/1 Thopter creature tokens with flying and a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
• Target creature gains undying until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if this creature has five or more counters on it, transform it.
cards.special_text:
[+2]: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains vigilance until end of turn.
[0]: Draw two cards, then discard a card
[-3]: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 4 or less
[-10]: Transform Raeden, Behemoth's Heart

Whenever another creature you control dies, draw a card.
